Change Log
----------

0.0.1 (23/10/2022)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
-First Release


0.0.2 (24/10/2022)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
-DecToHex function added

0.0.3 (24/10/2022)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
-HexToDec function added
-Functions now accept string inputs

0.0.4 (25/10/2022)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
-Improved error messages
